Package com.bomber7.core.model.square

Class MapElement

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.core.model.texture.ElementTexture
com.bomber7.core.model.square.MapElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, Wall
public abstract class MapElement extends ElementTexture
Abstract class representing a map element in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • MapElement

      public MapElement(String textureName, boolean verticalFlip, boolean horizontalFlip, boolean diagonalFlip)
      Constructs a new Square with the specified texture file path and texture ID.
      Parameters:
      textureName - the texture name for this square for the mapElement
      verticalFlip - whether to flip the texture vertically
      horizontalFlip - whether to flip the texture horizontally
      diagonalFlip - whether to flip the texture diagonally
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the sprite file path is null or empty

    • MapElement

      public MapElement(String textureName)
      Constructs a MapElement without specifying flip options (false by default). Useful for ids that dont need id_masks.
      Parameters:
      textureName - the texture name for this square for the map element
